title: The anatomie of baseness. Or the foure quarters of a knaue flatterie, ingratitude, enuie, detraction.
author: Andrewes, John, fl. 1615.
publisher: For Richard Redmer, and are to be sold at the west dore of Paules at the signe of the Starre,
notes: Dedication signed: I.A., i.e. John Andrewes.
The first leaf contains a large signature-mark A between two fragments of woodcuts.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
